div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 home-square et_clickable et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.h1:
In Pursuit of Math
and Science Excellence
div.p: CSW students represented Delaware in the 2018 National Envirothon and Science Olympiad.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 home-square et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.p: CSW has a rich history of outreach and mentoring; our students make a difference.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2 home-square et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-30243 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-sticky category-uncategorized

div.p: The Charter School of Wilmington will hold a virtual board meeting on Tuesday, April 28, 2020, starting at 6:30 p.m. Zoom instructions can be found on the agenda. Â

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-30015 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-sticky category-uncategorized

div.p: After considering the health and well-being of our scholars, faculty, staff, and families, The Charter School of Wilmington moved Â to "cyber learning" on March 16Â as a result of the COVID â 19 coronavirus outbreak in Delaware. Here are resources available to you and...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-30004 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-sticky category-uncategorized

h2.a: Incoming Freshmen Registration on April 1 Postponed

div.p: Â Freshmen registration for the Class of 2024 on April 1 has been postponed. We will send you an email when a new date has been selected. No outside guests may come into our building - this includes all visitors,Â guest speakers, parent volunteers, mentoring...

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4 home-square et_clickable et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.p: Artika Rangan Casini, Class of 2001, is the managing editor for the University of Delawareâs Messenger magazine and a communications expert.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 home-square et_clickable et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.p: Your support allows us to continue our mission of excellence, community, and leadership.

h3.br:
Delaware Department of Justice Bullying Prevention &
School Crime Contact (Ombudsperson) Anonymous Tip Line:
1-800-220-5414

div.p:
The Charter School of Wilmington
100 N. DuPont Road
Wilmington, DE 19807
(302) 651-2727
Fax: (302) 652-1246
